entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [WinAppSDK] Attaching controls to the visual tree is 40x slower on MAUI than on bare WinUI #6791
  • Cannot programmatically set focus to Button on MacCatalyst #6786
    6.0.300-servicing
  • CollectionView is positioned incorrectly and the scrolling is broken #6784
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [Android] Images aren't reloading correctly when you rebind to a CollectionView #6783
  • XAML designer/previewer #6782
  • The UI elements of the screen overlap with StatusBar on iOS on Modal Page #6769
    6.0.300-servicing
  • MediaPlayer or VLC Player #6764

Closed

  • Collection in StackLayout incorrect padding and margins #6524
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [iOS] DatePicker does not display initial value #6402
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] Checkbox with excess margin on the right side. #6449
    6.0.300
  • Shell view is not working properly. #5603
    6.0.300
  • RadioButton ControlTemplate ignored on Windows #6630
    6.0.300
  • Add new view in MAUI add dictionary template instead #6544
  • In RC2, FontImageSource does not work on Image.Source #6559
  • building untrimmed application on Android on Release ends with Exception 'Unable to find Java.Lang.AbstractMethodError constructor' #6569
  • Android - random Release build error #6573
  • Layout position not updated correctly while dynamically updated in windows platform #6618
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • DisplayActionSheet hangs app on cancel on MacCatalyst #6623
  • Loading image using ImageSource.FromFile not working on Android #6583
  • The UmAlQura calendar is getting crashed. #6505
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Run Worker service from MAUI throw exception #6604
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Glide tries to set TCS a second time if you background app and then return to it #6702
    6.0.300
  • ImageButton visual state does not reset #6676
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Why StackLayout has to be split into 3 different controls? #6766
  • HorizontalOptions FillAndExpand and Fill does not have any effect on the HorizontalStackLayout #6768
  • CollectionView with Header or Footer throws: The specified child already has a parent. You must call removeView() on the child's parent first #5332
    6.0.300
  • Working alternative for PlatformImage for Maui.Graphics.IImage for Windows? #6742
  • DisplayActionSheet Inside a Shell Does Not Work on Windows #6639
    6.0.300
  • [WinUI] Margin not applied for CollectionView items on WinUI #5621
    6.0.300
  • Content Page- Disappearing event not fire #6722
  • PathFigureCollectionConverter.ParseStringToPathFigureCollection not working correctly #6670
  • [Android] ListView does not calculate RowHeight (uses fixed value?) #6651
    6.0.300
  • [Android] SwipeView as CollectionView itemtemplate black rendering #4119
    6.0.300
  • Native controls are not rendered in some cases when BlazorWebView is present on Android #4009
    6.0.300-servicing
  • BackgroundColor not changed #5380
    6.0.300
  • Cannot use StaticResources for resources in App.xaml #3878
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Dependency injection breaks AppThemeBinding #5868
    6.0.300
  • Invoke Platform Code Works For One Platform Only, But Flagged As Wrong For The Two Others #5294
    6.0.300-servicing
  • New Maui solution, AppDelegate intellisense issues #4726
    6.0.300-servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • Base the Modal Size and position off the root window view #6792
  • Add the three-parameter overload #6790
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0.300
  • Fix overlapping text with Label spans #6789
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-label, 6.0.300
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1185.39 to 1.0.1210.30 #6779
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Common from 2.4.1.1 to 2.4.2 #6777
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.UI from 2.4.1.1 to 2.4.2 #6776
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Runtime from 2.4.1.1 to 2.4.2 #6775
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Fragment from 2.4.1.2 to 2.4.2 #6774
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Move some of the require props into Core and fix #6529 #6767
    area/single project ☝️, platform/windows 🪟, p/1, 6.0.300
  • [GH-6523] Fix toolbar text color #6765
    area/navigation 🧭, 6.0.300

Merged

  • Remove closure from AddSpecific and AddWeakSpecific #6787
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/perf 🏎️, 6.0.300
  • Fix operator precedence #6788
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker, 6.0.300
  • Fix various measure/layout issues with android flyout #6759
    area/layout 🔲
  • Fix the file check for the AppxManifest #6770
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.300
  • [Windows] Render RadioButton ControlTemplate #6785
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton, 6.0.300
  • Revert "Add VC Redist dependency to Windows templates" #6758
    platform/windows 🪟, area/publishing 🏁
  • Remove remaining asserts from PR 6237 #6686
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, 6.0.300
  • Ensure glide targets run once #6739
    platform/android 🤖, area/image :framed_picture:, p/0, 6.0.300
  • [Android] Fix usage of SimpleViewHolder on COllectionView Header and Footer #6682
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Android WebAuthenticator fallback to system browser if Chrome Custom tabs are not available #6743
    platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.300
  • Fix margin related measuring with CV #6762
    platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • Exclude platform-specific items using metadata #6681
    area/tooling ⚙️, 6.0.300
  • Fix Opacity for Wrapper Views #6711
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300
  • Add svg to default copied bundle items for mac/ios #4863
    t/enhancement ☀️, platform/macOS 🍏, area/single project ☝️, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, delighter, 6.0.300

Updated

  • [workload] Remove Microsoft.Maui.Extensions pack #5918
    do-not-merge, area/setup 🪄
  • [Tizen] Bump Tizen.UIExtensions from 0.6.0-pre1 to 0.8.0-pre1 #6615
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, platform/tizen
